original_text: For, being ignorant of the righteousness of God, and seeking to establish their own, they did not submit to God's righteousness.
korean_text: 하나님의 의를 모르고 자기 의를 세우려고 힘써 하나님의 의에 복종하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: For, being ignorant of the righteousness of God,
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 하나님의 의를 알지 못하고

sentences.original_text: and seeking to establish their own,
they did not submit to God's righteousness.
